marketing.title: Before/After Content Generation
marketing.description: AI can help you turn job site photos into compelling before/after posts. Describe the transformation, add dramatic flair, and schedule across platforms.

marketing.title: Review Response Automation
marketing.description: Automatically draft personalized responses to Google and Facebook reviews. Keeps your response rate high and shows you care about feedback.

marketing.title: Local SEO Content
marketing.description: Generate location-specific service pages and blog posts. Rank for 'forestry mulching [city]' and 'land clearing near me' searches.

marketing.title: Video Script Writing
marketing.description: Turn your job footage into engaging YouTube content. AI writes scripts, suggests hooks, and creates descriptions optimized for search.

marketing.title: Seasonal Campaign Automation
marketing.description: Automatically launch campaigns for peak seasons — spring cleanup, storm damage response, fire prevention season.

sales.title: Instant Quote Calculator
sales.description: Let property owners get rough estimates based on acreage, terrain, and vegetation density. Filters serious buyers from tire-kickers.

sales.title: Lead Qualification Chatbot
sales.description: A chatbot asks about property size, access, timeline, and budget — then routes qualified leads directly to your phone.

sales.title: Automated Follow-Up Sequences
sales.description: When someone requests a quote but doesn't book, automated texts and emails follow up until they convert or say no.

sales.title: Property Research Automation
sales.description: Before a site visit, AI pulls county records, aerial imagery, and parcel data so you arrive prepared.

admin.title: Job Scheduling & Dispatch
admin.description: Automatically assign jobs based on equipment location, job size, and crew availability. Optimize for minimal travel between sites.

admin.title: Invoice Generation
admin.description: Generate invoices automatically when jobs complete. Include before/after photos, acreage cleared, and payment links.

admin.title: Contract & Proposal Generation
admin.description: AI drafts proposals based on site visit notes. Include scope, timeline, pricing, and terms — ready for signature.

admin.title: Permit Research
admin.description: AI helps research local clearing permits, wetland regulations, and burn restrictions before you quote a job.

operations.title: Equipment Hour Tracking
operations.description: Track mulcher and skid steer hours automatically. Get maintenance alerts based on actual usage, not calendar time.

operations.title: Fuel & Expense Tracking
operations.description: Log fuel purchases automatically. Track cost-per-acre and identify which jobs are most profitable.

operations.title: Weather-Based Scheduling
operations.description: AI monitors weather and automatically suggests rescheduling when conditions aren't suitable for mulching.

operations.title: Job Photo Documentation
operations.description: Automatically organize job photos by date, location, and client. Generate progress reports with before/during/after shots.

operations.title: Parts & Supply Reordering
operations.description: Track mulcher teeth, hydraulic fluid, and consumables. Get automatic reorder alerts before you run out mid-job.

customerService.title: Automated Booking Confirmation
customerService.description: When a job is scheduled, automatically send confirmation with date, time window, and what to expect.

customerService.title: Job Status Updates
customerService.description: Automatic texts when crew is en route, when work starts, and when the job is complete with photos.

customerService.title: Review Request Automation
customerService.description: Text customers right after job completion asking for a Google review. Include a direct link to make it one-tap easy.

customerService.title: Maintenance Reminder Sequences
customerService.description: For ongoing clients, automatically reach out when it's time for another clearing — seasonal or annual.
